script.name: !job.trade.miner
script.sourceplaintext:
* SymTec (27-05-08) if [THIS] -> get job leader START [THIS] -> delayed command COMMAND_DESTROY_THIS : arg1=null, arg2=null, arg3=null, arg4=100 return null end
* make sure the ship can store minerals if not [THIS] -> can transport ware Nividium if not [THIS] -> can transport ware Ore if not [THIS] -> can transport ware Silicon Ore START [THIS] -> delayed command COMMAND_DESTROY_THIS : arg1=null, arg2=null, arg3=null, arg4=100 return null end end end
if not [THIS] -> get amount of ware Mobile Drilling System in cargo bay $turrets = [THIS] -> get number of turrets $i = 0 while $i < $turrets if [THIS] -> fits laser Mobile Drilling System into turret $i = [THIS] -> install 1 units of Mobile Drilling System break end inc $i = end end
[THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_MINING_DEBRIS [THIS] ->connect ship command/signal COMMAND_MINING_DEBRIS to script !job.trade.miner with prio 0
skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Ore Collector in cargo bay = [THIS] -> install 1 units of Ore Collector skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Mineral Scanner in cargo bay = [THIS] -> install 1 units of Mineral Scanner
$homesector = random value from 10000 to 300000 - 1 if [THIS] -> is docked @ = wait $homesector ms else if not [THIS] -> is in active sector @ = [THIS] -> move around $homesector ms end * Constants
$jumps = [THIS] -> get job jump range $homesector = [THIS] -> get homesector if not $homesector $homesector = [SECTOR] [THIS] ->set homesector to $homesector end
$minerals = create new array, arguments=Ore, Silicon Ore, Nividium, null, null $minerals.amt = size of array $minerals
while 1 @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms * Set Command $rnd = random value from 0 to $minerals.amt - 1 $mineral = $minerals[$rnd]
[THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_MINING_DEBRIS target=$mineral target2=$homesector par1=null par2=null [THIS] ->reset flight time
$sector.array = $homesector -> find all sectors within $jumps jumps: Only known sectors=null
$sector.array.i = size of array $sector.array $sector = null while $sector.array.i dec $sector.array.i = $sector.try = $sector.array[$sector.array.i] @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms
$sector.owner = $sector.try -> get owner race $rel = [THIS] -> get relation to race $sector.owner if $rel == Neutral OR $rel == Friend if find debris: sector=$sector.try resource=$mineral min yield=1 flags=null refobj=[THIS] num=null max distance=null refpos=null
$sector = $sector.try break end end end
* no ice found - should not happen! Bad! Anyway - wait. if not $sector *= [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosafestation : @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=900 wait while docked=[TRUE] continue end
* mine ice if [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay [THIS] ->set destination to $sector @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$sector [THIS] ->set destination to null @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.mine.sector : Mineral Array=$mineral Amount=-1 Break Asterods?=[TRUE] end
* sell ice if [HOMEBASE] -> exists if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=[HOMEBASE] if [THIS] -> is docked $i = size of array $minerals while $i dec $i = $m = $minerals[$i] $amt = [THIS] -> get amount of ware $m in cargo bay = [THIS] ->load $amt units of $m, ignore minimum=[FALSE] end @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock : end end end
if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay @ = [THIS] -> call script !trade.sellwarebest : return to station=null ware=$mineral price=null amount=null jumps=$jumps around sector=$homesector stay if unable to sell=null @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock : else *= [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosafestation : @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=300 wait while docked=[TRUE] end
@ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=15 wait while docked=null end return null * Gazz (07.03.13): Miners no longer block docking ports when idling

comment.var: make sure the ship can store minerals
no ice found - should not happen! Bad! Anyway - wait.
Gazz (07.03.13): Miners no longer block docking ports when idling

sval.val: make sure the ship can store minerals
no ice found - should not happen! Bad! Anyway - wait.
Gazz (07.03.13): Miners no longer block docking ports when idling
